Task title: Design a new logo for a startup
Description: We need a modern, minimalist logo for our new SaaS company, 'InnovateAI'. Please provide concepts in SVG format.

Task title: Create a reusable React pricing component
Description: Build a responsive pricing table component using React and Tailwind CSS. It should support 3 tiers and a toggle for monthly/yearly billing.

Task title: Write documentation for a REST API
Description: Document our new API endpoints for user management. Must be in OpenAPI/Swagger format. We will provide the endpoint details.

Task title: Set up a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions
Description: Configure a GitHub Actions workflow to automatically test and deploy our Next.js application to Firebase Hosting.
